content.p: NewsAgent is a completely free Java USENET Newsreader. It was written by Brian Duff and is currently in development as an open source project.
As well as being a fully featured News reader, the program also has support for Agents: plugin modules which can affect the way messages are processed when reading or posting news articles.
As of this month, I'm no longer actively developing NewsAgent. The source code for NewsAgent will remain on the dubh.org cvs repository for the forseeable future.
Instead, I'm switching my development effort to the Mozilla Grendel project. Grendel aims to be a Java mail/news client, and is already far more fully featured than NewsAgent ever was.
If you have comments or queries about NewsAgent, you should post them to the Grendel Development forum on talk.dubh.org.
